title: CellxGene Schema Definition
description: JSON schema for validating CellxGene schema definition YAML files that specify validation rules for single-cell datasets

title.description: Human-readable title for the schema version (e.g., 'Corpora schema version 5.X.X')

type.description: The type of data structure this schema validates

sparsity.description: Sparsity threshold (0-1) above which a warning is issued if the expression matrix is not in CSR sparse format

raw.description: Defines conditions for when raw data requirements should be enforced

obs.description: Observation-level conditions for raw data requirements

pre_analysis.description: Rules for what is allowed/required before analysis (e.g., ensuring certain fields/keys are absent/present)

components.description: Main schema components defining validation rules for different parts of the AnnData object

obsm.description: Cell observation annotation matrices (e.g., PCA, UMAP embeddings)

obsp.description: Cell observation pairwise annotations (e.g., cell-cell distances)

obs.description: Cell observations component containing cell metadata

pre_analysis_component_rules.description: Allowed/required rules for a component and optional per-key rules

allowed.description: Whether this component is allowed to exist

keys.description: Per-key allow/require rules (used for uns keys, etc.)

field_validation_rules.description: Generic validation rules that can be applied to any field

descendants_of_all.description: Field must be a descendant of ALL specified terms

not_descendants_of.description: Field must NOT be a descendant of any of these terms

uns_component.description: Unstructured annotations component containing dataset-level metadata

required.description: Whether this component is required in the dataset

reserved_columns.description: Column names reserved by the schema that should not be used by users

deprecated_columns.description: Column names that are deprecated and should not be used

keys.description: Validation rules for specific keys in the unstructured annotations

dataframe_component.description: Component representing a pandas DataFrame with validation rules

required.description: Whether this component is required in the dataset

warn_if_less_than_rows.description: Issue a warning if the DataFrame has fewer than this many rows

index.description: Validation rules for the DataFrame index

columns.description: Validation rules for specific DataFrame columns

forbidden_columns.description: Column names that must not be present in this DataFrame

deprecated_columns.description: Column names that are deprecated and should not be used

reserved_columns.description: Column names reserved by the schema

annotation_mapping_component.description: Component for annotation mappings (matrices or pairwise data)

required.description: Whether this component is required in the dataset

obs_component.description: Cell observations component containing detailed cell metadata validation rules

required.description: Whether this component is required in the dataset

index.description: Validation rules for the DataFrame index (cell IDs)

deprecated_columns.description: Column names that are deprecated and should not be used

reserved_columns.description: Column names reserved by the schema

columns.description: Validation rules for cell metadata columns

unique.description: Whether index values must be unique

type.description: The expected data type for index values

add_labels.description: Labels to automatically add based on index values

field_specification.description: Complete validation specification for a data field

type.description: The data type expected for this field

enum.description: List of allowed values for categorical fields

element_type.description: For list fields, the type of elements in the list

curie_constraints.description: Constraints for CURIE (Compact URI) fields referencing ontology terms

dependencies.description: Conditional validation rules that depend on other field values

add_labels.description: Labels to automatically add based on field values

error_message_suffix.description: Custom error message to append when validation fails

warning_message.description: Warning message to display for certain conditions

forbidden.description: List of disallowed values for categorical fields

curie_constraints.description: Validation constraints for CURIE (ontology term) fields

allowed.description: Terms or term ancestors that are allowed

forbidden.description: Terms or term ancestors that are forbidden

exceptions.description: Special string values that are allowed (e.g., 'unknown', 'na')

multi_term.description: Rules for fields that can contain multiple ontology terms

delimiter.description: String used to separate multiple terms (e.g., ' || ')

sorted.description: Whether multiple terms must be in sorted order

term_constraints.description: Constraints specifying allowed or forbidden ontology terms

terms.description: Specific terms that are allowed or forbidden

ancestors.description: Terms whose descendants are allowed or forbidden

ontology_terms_by_prefix.description: Ontology terms organized by their prefix/namespace

multi_term_constraints.description: Additional constraints that apply only when multiple terms are present

dependency_rule.description: Conditional validation rule that applies when certain conditions are met

rule.description: The condition that must be met for this dependency to apply

error_message_suffix.description: Custom error message for this specific dependency

type.description: The data type required when this dependency applies

curie_constraints.description: CURIE constraints that apply when this dependency is active

enum.description: Allowed values when this dependency is active

condition_rule_or_list.description: A single condition rule, or a list of condition rules (AND semantics)

condition_rule.description: Rule specifying conditions for dependency activation

column.description: Column name to check for the condition

uns_key.description: Key in unstructured annotations to check

match_ancestors_inclusive.description: Values or their ancestors that must match (inclusive of the terms themselves)

exclude_exact.description: Values that must not match exactly

exclude_ancestors_inclusive.description: Values or their ancestors that must not match

match_constraint.description: Constraint for matching values or ancestors

add_label_specification.description: Specification for automatically adding labels based on field values

type.description: The type of label to add

to_column.description: Target column name for the added label

to_key.description: Target key name for the added label (for unstructured data)
